resources.string: This monster may ignore enemy figures and the effects of terrain while moving. It must end its movement in an empty space following normal movement rules.
If this attack deals at least 1 :dam: (after the defense roll), the target is stunned.
This attack ignores X :def: rolled on the defense dice.
Add X additional damage to the attack.
Add X additional damage to the attack.

Choose a hero adjacent to this monster. That hero must test :mig:. If he fails, roll 1 yellow power die. The hero suffers 1 :fat: per :dam: rolled, and this monster recovers 1 :dam: per Fatigue suffered.
If this attack deals at least 1 :dam: (after the defense roll), the target is Poisoned.
Each hero adjacent to this monster must test Awareness. Each hero that fails is Immobilized.
This monster may move through spaces containing heroes.
Add X additional spaces to the range.
Each hero within 3 spaces of this monster must test :wil:. Each hero that fails suffers 1 :fat:.
If attacked by any non-adjacent hero, this monster may add 1 brown die to its defense roll.

When this monster attacks, it uses the dice of a figure (overlord\'s choice) in its line of sight. If a hero is chosen, the overlord may choose which of the hero\'s equipped weapon to use. The monster cannot use any of the figure\'s other abilities, just the dice.
After making an attack roll, this monster may convert up to X range to :dam:, or up to X :dam: to range.
The target suffers 1 :fat:.
Each time a hero enters a space adjacent to this monster, that hero suffers X :dam:.
This attack affects all figures adjacent to the target space.
Choose a hero adjacent to this monster. That hero must test :wil:. If he fails, he moves 2 spaces dircectly away from this monster and is Immobilized.
A hero adjacent to this monster that declares an attack must spend 1 :sur: or the attack is considered a miss.
Starting with the target space, trace a path of 4 spaces in any direction. All figures on this path are affected by this attack. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.
Each hero adjacent to this monster must test :wil:. Each hero that fails suffers 2 :fat:.
Perform an attack targeting all figures adjacent to this monster. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.
Each hero adjacent to this monster must test :awa:. Each hero that fails is Immobilized.
Until the start of your next turn, this monster can only be affected by attacks from adjacent figures.
Each hero adjacent to this monster must suffer 1 :fat: to move out of his current space; this is in addition to any other :fat: suffered to move.
This monster cannot spend surges on abilities unless it is within 3 spaces of any master monster or a lieutenant.
Each attack that targets this monster must roll 3 additional range beyond the normally required amount or the attack is a miss.
When this monster is defeated, remove it from the map and then replace it with a minion of the same type, ignoring group limits.
This monster may attack targets up to 2 spaces away.

Choose a hero adjacent to this monster. That hero must test :mig:. If he fails, remove the hero from the map, then place him on any empty space within 3 spaces of his original space. He counts as entering that space. Then the hero suffers 1 :dam:.
If this attack deals at least 1 :dam: (after the defense roll), the target is Diseased.
Perform an attack. This attack affects each figure within range of this monder\'s attack. Each figure rolls defense die separately.
This monster is immune to Pierce and to all conditions.
This monster may choose to ignore any game effect that would force it to move.
Choose a minion within 3 spaces of this monster. Place that minion in an empty space adjacent to this monster.
Both of this monster\'s actions on a turn may be attack actions.
Each minion within 3 spaces of this monster may reroll 1 die on each of its attacks. Each minion may only benefit from one monster with Command at a time.
This monster deals +1 :dam: for each other monster adjacent to the target.
When this monster is defeated, replace it with 2 minions of the same type in the closest available empty spaces, ignoring group limits.
If this attack deals at least 1 :dam: (after the defense roll), the target is Immobilized.
When attacking, this monster may target 2 separate heroes. This monster makes 1 attack roll and each hero rolls defense dice separately.
This monster recovers X :dam:.
Choose a monster within 3 spaces of this monster and roll 1 red power die. The chosen monster recovers :dam: equal to the :dam: rolled.
Choose a hero adjacent to this monster. The hero must test :mig:. If the hero fails, he is Immobilized.
Remove the target from the map, then place him on any empty space within 3 spaces of his original space. He counts as entering that space.
Each hero within 3 spaces of this monster must test :wil:. Each hero that fails suffers 1 :fat:.
Each time a hero enters a space adjacent to this monster, that hero suffers 1 :fat:.

If a hero is defeated by this monster, remove his hero token from the map and place it on this monster’s base. The hero cannot be revived until this monster is defeated, at which point his hero token is placed in one of this monster’s spaces.

This monster may move its Speed, ignoring enemy figures as it does so. When it finishes its movement, perform a single attack that targets each figure this monster moved through. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. Limit once per turn.
Choose an adjacent hero. That hero must test :awa:. If he fails, he suffers 3 :dam:.
This monster may not perform more than 1 move action during a single turn.
This monster ignores all effects of lava. Each time this monster ends its turn in a space containing lava, it recovers 1 :dam:. In addition, this monster never suffers :dam: from Burning.
If this attack deals at least 1 :dam: (after the defense roll), the target is Burning.
When this monster is defeated, each hero adjacent to this monster suffers 1 :dam:.
Each of this monster\'s attacks targeting a hero with 2 or less :mig: gains +1 :dam:.
Move each adjacent Cursed hero up to 2 spaces in any direction of your choice.
If this attack deals at least 1 :dam: (after the defense roll), the target is Cursed.
This monster may move 3 spaces, then perform an attack.
When a hero adjacent to this monster would discard a Poisoned or Diseased Condition card, he instead keeps the card.

Perform an attack targeting up to 2 heroes adjacent to this monster. 1 attack roll is made but each hero rolls defense dice separately. Each target that suffers at least 1 :dam: from this attack (after the defense roll) is Immobilized.
When this monster is defeated, each adjacent hero must test :wil:. Each hero that fails is Cursed.
Each hero adjacent to this monster at the start of his turn must test :wil:. Each hero that fails is Diseased.

Remove this figure from the map and place it in empty or occupied spaces up to 3 spaces away. Each figure occupying any target space is moved to the closes empty space of your choice and suffers 1 :fat:. Limit once per monster turn.
Each minion monster from this monster group within 5 spaces of this monster may immediately move 2 spaces.
If this attack deals at least 1 :dam: (after defense roll), the target is Weakened.
